statement.p: A hoverboard manufacturer has just announced the Glide 5 hoverboard. The accounting department has determined that the cost to manufacturer the Glide 5 hoverboard is \displaystyle{y}={21.58}{x}+{42276}. The revenue equation is \displaystyle{y}={75.78}{x}. What is the break even point for the Glide 5 hoverboard?
The break even point for the Glide 5 hoverboard is
